valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 10 Nov 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 11 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low north Scotland 995 losing its identity. Low mid-Atlantic expected 100 miles west of Shannon 975 by midday tomorrow
